items.title: If Nifty Bank breaks this resistance then it could move to 53k; details

items.title: Indian market's record 11-month stock rally at risk as profits cool

items.title: Gold price today: Trading strategy for yellow metal ahead of China stimulus
items.description: If  China's stimulus details prove to be convincing to investor community, it is highly likely that gold prices may come under increased downside pressure
